subject: [Radiance-general] Upgrading to R4: "There were some errors."
body:
Hi,

I think that for a stock install of Ubuntu you need to install a few
additional packages (using synaptics makes this pretty easy), off the
top of my head you will likely need the following:

* x11 development libs
* csh

Not sure what else off hand. Note however (a quick search of the list
might have come up with this...), that I actually have provided Radiance
4.0 binaries compiled on Ubuntu 9.10. These are available as follows:


--
# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
